flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1040>>1040
So there was 1040-1000=$<<1040-1000=40>>40 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 40*0.1=$<<40*0.1=4.0>>4.0
So his purchase came out to 1040-4.0=$<<1040-4.0=1036.0>>1036.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1400, not 1040. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
